DeadlandsEnchantments.NoFxMaster: The Fx Master module is not installed so the animation canÂ´t be played
DeadlandsEnchantments.CommaWarning: Deadlands Gun Enchantments Warning:  There are commas present in either your weapon or creature lists.  Be sure to convert all commas between each type to vertical bars (|).  This warning can be disabled in module settings.

animationTemplate.title: Animation file
animationTemplate.note: Select the animation file you want to use.

gunType.title: Guns by gun type
gunType.note: Provide the gun names for the selected gun type, separated by vertical bars (|), you can also drag and drop from the items tab, from a compendium or from the actor or creature sheet

bloodTypes.title: Creature/Actor by blood type
bloodTypes.note: Provide the creature/actor names for the selected blood type, separated by vertical bars (|), you can also drag and drop from the actors tab or from a compendium

scream.name: Enable "Wilhelm" scream
scream.hint: This plays the "Wilhem" scream sound effect when a target is hit with a raise.

commaCheck.name: Enable comma delimiter check
commaCheck.hint: This enables checking for commas in the current settings to warn the GM to make sure all commas are properly converted to vertical bars for the weapon and creature lists.

animationFiles.name: Animation files by gun type
animationFiles.label: Animations
animationFiles.hint: Here you can config the animation files by gun type

gunTypes.name: Gun names by type
gunTypes.label: Guns by type
gunTypes.hint: Here you can pair the gun names with the gun types to activate animations and sound effects

bloodSettings.name: Blood configuration by creature
bloodSettings.label: Blood
bloodSettings.hint: Here you can assign the blood color per creature name (red by default)

Settings.animationFileCreditUnknown: unknown source - if discovered, please raise an issue so it can be attributed.
